Botanica Green - perfectly positioned for families
*Botanica Green is a new boutique residential estate
*Offering an impressive list of lifestyle rich features

*Only 4.6 km from the Bendigo CBD
*Positioned in one of Bendigo's most highly regarded locations
*Close to schools, shops, health & sporting facilities
*Walking and cycling trails nearby

Why not give us a call to ascertain how you could secure the block today and still receive the grants.
*Lot sizes from 525m2 to 795m2

Plans approved and drawings ready to go - two realistically priced blocks plus leased land of 2400m2
- Established boutique sub-division - two of only three blocks left
- Close to excellent schools, shops, pharmacy, medical and all amenities
- Walk to the beautiful Botanic gardens and a stroll to Lake Weeroona
- Opportunity for a buyer to build immediately - plans approved and drawings ready to go for two homes
- Only 4 minutes or 4.4km to Central Bendigo
- A lovely 350m2 block, 364m2 block on separate titles plus 2400m2 of leased land
- Extremely good value for money in a blue chip locale
A fabulous opportunity for the investor to build two brand new homes and be creative for both with access to a 2400m2 parcel of leased land. Opportunity to build the new two homes, great for the family wanting two homes on adjoining blocks for the younger family and mum and dad. This is a very rare opportunity to secure a 350m2 block, a 364m2 block and also a half acre (approx 2400m2) of leased land.

Description:
Modern Spacious Townhouse – Excellent Location!
Situated in an established quiet location, close to the botanical gardens/parkland and leisure facilities is this spacious modern townhouse. A true departure from the ordinary this property includes a formal lounge and large open plan meals/living with well appointed kitchen including stone bench tops and dishwasher. Both bedrooms include built in robes and reverse cycle air-conditioning, and are serviced by a well appointed bathroom with good size shower and bath. There is internal access from the double length garage to the home, a powder room and reverse cycle air-conditioning to service the living areas. From the kitchen/meals you have access to the enclosed private rear yard. A fantastic location to reside and enjoy all the lifestyle facilities this position has on offer, and only a short drive to the CBD. Will also suit the investor.
Insights: 2/52 Raglan Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 9 other 2 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Position Perfect In Tree Lined Street
In a great location - walking distance to the White Hills Primary school, the beautiful Botanical Gardens and some of the best riding and walking trails within Bendigo, is this spacious two bedroom brick home. In the larger main bedroom, we find a split system heating and cooling for that bit of extra comfort; both bedrooms have built in robes. There is a central main bathroom, then down the hall we find the open plan area which incorporates the light filled kitchen that features lots of bench and cupboard space. In the same area is a spacious lounge and dining area, which also has a split system heating and cooling - this area offers lots of space with plenty of room for a dining table and three piece lounge suite. Outside features include a garden shed, rain water tank and stunning gardens - front and back, veggie boxes and path ways that wander through the greenery. To complete the home you have great side access to the carport and plenty of space for your boat, caravan or trailer. Opportunities like this don't come up that often - located close to schools, shops and public transport. All of this on a great size allotment with plenty of options are rare to find - book an inspection today.

Description:
Renovated winner in racecourse precinct.
Ideal weatherboard family home has been extensively renovated and now offers four bedrooms or three plus study with spacious open-style living, kitchen and dining areas.
Features include stainless steel gas cooker, pantry, ample storage, timber-look floors, ducted heating and cooling and lovely timber deck at the front overlooking a relaxing fishpond with waterfall and neat gardens with irrigation.
Updated bathroom includes corner spa bath, shower, vanity and toilet while the walk-through laundry leads to an extensive covered outdoor living area complete with ceiling fans, lights , gas barbecue, and bar fridge.
Convenient corner allotment measures approximately 847m2 with a caravan carport off Heinz Street and side access from Murphy Street to the big backyard with a double garage and a large 57m2 shed with benches, shelving, air conditioner and ceiling fan. Both have concrete flooring and power connected.
There is also a large sandpit and monkey bars that would be sure to please any child. A large veggie garden and chicken coop/animal enclosure is waiting for those wanting to become more self-sufficient.
Great location close to schools, public transport, local cafes and pub, the ever-popular Bendigo Botanic Gardens and White Hills Recreation Reserve.
Insights: 22 Heinz Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 11 other 4 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
Unique investment opportunity
Positioned on a large 627m2 corner allotment only five minutes from the heart of Bendigo, this three bedroom, single bathroom Western Red Cedar cottage in original condition is ideal for renovators or developers looking for central city access without the high inner city price tag.
Zoned general residential with existing cross over access along two boundaries the property lends itself to a two lot subdivision, dual townhouse development (STCA) or renovation of the existing timber dwelling. The home provides an open plan kitchen-dining-living space with direct access to a compact third bedroom or study, laundry and separate toilet.
The L shaped kitchen includes a double sink, timber cabinetry, Chef upright gas cooker and corner pantry. The living room with gas heating and ceiling fan features timber French doors that open directly onto the large brick paved undercover alfresco area. The remaining two bedrooms are both double in size and are serviced by a bathroom with hand basin and combined bath and shower. A new gas hot water service has been recently installed.
The fully fenced block with brick shed, child’s cubby house and playground provides under cover parking from Waratah Street as well double gate access to the large rear yard off Finn Street.
Located in walking distance to Weeroona Secondary College and Lake Weeroona and only a short drive to all White Hills amenities and the new Epsom Village; this property provides a unique investment opportunity.
Insights: 1 Waratah Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
First home buyers need not look any further!
From the ground up, inside and out, this perfectly-presented, cosy 3 bedroom home has all the attributes, features and benefits of any new home on the market today.
Featuring new window and floor coverings, ducted heating and cooling, a brand new kitchen with appliances to keep the chef of the home happy, and a bathroom and laundry to be proud of also.
The 3 bedrooms all offer built-in robes, carpets, and a great size.
The separate lounge has new polished boards, and the dining overlooks its own private deck area.
Outside on the corner allotment, you have separate drive access off O'Keefe Street into a 12m x 3.6m shed with concrete floor and power.
Detached alfresco and secure yards.
Just minutes to walking tracks and Lake Weeroona, and a short drive to the new hospital precinct and Bendigo Central.

Description:
BRICK VENEER - PRIME LOCATION
3 Bedrooms; main with ensuite
Updated kitchen w/ gas app & dishwasher
Good size lounge w/ gas heater & air con
3 Piece bathroom w/ separate shower
Double carport & large garden shed
Ample sized backyard
Fully landscaped front garden
Close to public transport, 5 mins to Bendigo
LIFESTYLE:
This excellent family home is just minutes from central Bendigo as well as being close to the beautiful White Hills Botanical Gardens.
Located in a quiet court setting, with fully landscaped gardens, this solid family home is ready to simply move in and enjoy.
FEATURES:
The house features 3 bedrooms with built in robes, the main with an ensuite. The updated kitchen has gas appliances and a dishwasher.
A good sized lounge room with air conditioning and gas heater ensure year round comfort. The fully tiled bathroom has the bonus of a separate shower.
The outside offers a good sized storage area, and a large garden shed. The fully landscaped garden ensures that the hard work has all been done, just maintain and enjoy.
LOCATION:
This is in a prime location; just 5 minutes from the Bendigo CBD and all of te amenities of the White Hills developing area.
This property would be ideal for the first home buyer - a good solid home with no work to be done.
